title: Sky Rhythm & Motion
description: Understand how the sky shifts hourly and seasonally so you can plan sessions.
tldr: The sky moves about 15 degrees per hour. Plan short sessions, and note seasonal shifts to find targets faster.

sections.title: Hourly drift
sections.body: Stars appear to move westward as Earth rotates. Short sessions keep your targets in view.

sections.title: Seasonal changes
sections.body: Constellations shift across seasons. Keep a simple calendar of what appears in each month.

sections.title: Session planning
sections.body: Pick two targets per session. This reduces decision fatigue and makes learning steady.
